page.title: 12The Villager, Thurleigh
page.content: The Church produces amagazine called the Villager. This is published once a month, 11 months a year. It is delivered free of charge to every household in Thurleigh and Milton Ernest. The cost of printing the magazine is covered by the advertising space on the cover. The first page is always written by the vicar and the rest of the magazine is edited by a volunteer. The magazine is twofold in it's value; not only does it bring the message of the Church into every household, it also covers all community items involving the 2 villages, articles for sale and forthcoming events. This is a good way of ensuring that everyone in the area is kept abreast of what is happening and also makes for a caring community.
